SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller

Class StudentGradeStatisticController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.StudentGradeStatisticController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class StudentGradeStatisticController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The StudentGradeStatisticController class handles the statistics related to the grades of a student in the exam system. It manages the display of the student's grades and the details of each exam, including the questions and answers.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    StudentGradeStatisticController.GradeDetailClass
    This GradeDetailClass is to be used by gradeTable to help display data Represents the details of a student's grade for a specific exam.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller after its root element has been completely processed. This method is called automatically after the FXML file is loaded.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.

    • setStudent

      public void setStudent(Student student)
      Sets the student for which the statistics will be displayed. Sets the content of the tables and charts
      Parameters:
      student - The student whose grades and statistics are to be displayed.
